title: I missed the boat on 1000 wins
body: I missed the chance to play with a Rioter at 1000 wins. Now I'm around 2000. Any Rioters want to play anyway? :)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=yiZAl5cN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-13T02:35:03.484+0000)
>
> When are you free? :3

Most of the time. Send me a friend request whenever you see this!

I hit 1,000 wins just under a week ago. Are you or any other Rioter down to play with me? :)
https://gyazo.com/ee4dc3d69831c77929615f6be7cee14f
